001package com.technototes.library.hardware.motor;
002
003import com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.DcMotorSimple;
004import com.technototes.library.hardware.HardwareDeviceGroup;
005
006/** Class for encoded motor groups
007 * @author Alex Stedman
008 */
009@SuppressWarnings("unused")
010public class EncodedMotorGroup<T extends DcMotorSimple>
011    extends EncodedMotor<T>
012    implements HardwareDeviceGroup<Motor<T>> {
013
014    private final Motor<T>[] followers;
015
016    /** Create an encoded motor groupM
017     *
018     * @param leader The Lead motor
019     * @param followers The following motors
020     */
021    public EncodedMotorGroup(EncodedMotor<T> leader, Motor<T>... followers) {
022        super(leader.getDevice());
023        this.followers = followers;
024    }
025
026    @Override
027    public Motor<T>[] getFollowers() {
028        return followers;
029    }
030
031    @Override
032    public Motor<T>[] getAllDevices() {
033        Motor<T>[] m = new Motor[followers.length + 1];
034        m[0] = this;
035        System.arraycopy(followers, 0, m, 1, m.length - 1);
036        return m;
037    }
038
039    @Override
040    public void propogate(double value) {
041        for (Motor<T> m : followers) {
042            m.setSpeed(value);
043        }
044    }
045
046    @Override
047    public void setVelocity(double tps) {
048        super.setVelocity(tps);
049        propogate(super.getSpeed());
050    }
051
052    @Override
053    public boolean setPosition(double ticks, double speed) {
054        boolean b = super.setPosition(ticks, speed);
055        propogate(super.getSpeed());
056        return b;
057    }
058}
